fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Add 1000 to someone's post number, converting them accordingly.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - If the result post number doesn't exist, subtract 1000 instead.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: End the game having your net post number changing be 2000 or more (for example, adding 3 and subtract 1).
